metadata.title: CVE-2021-47388 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mac80211: fix use-after-free in CCMP/GCMP RXWhen PN checking is done in mac80211, for fragmentation we needto copy the PN to the RX struct so we can later use it to do acomparison, since commit bf30ca922a0c ("mac80211: check defragPN against current frame").Unfortunately, in that commit I used the 'hdr' variable withoutit being necessarily valid, so use-after-free could occur if itwas necessary to reallocate (parts of) the frame.Fix this by reloading the variable after the code that resultsin the reallocations, if any.This fixes https://bugzilla.kernel.org/show_bug.cgi?id=214401.
